class.name: Phaser.Tile

parameters.name: layer
parameters.help: The layer in the Tilemap data that this tile belongs to.

parameters.name: index
parameters.help: The index of this tile type in the core map data.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The x coordinate of this tile.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The y coordinate of this tile.

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: Width of the tile.

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: Height of the tile.

class.help: A Tile is a representation of a single tile within the Tilemap.

public.name: containsPoint

returns.help: True if the coordinates are within this Tile, otherwise false.

public.help: Check if the given x and y world coordinates are within this Tile.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The x coordinate to test.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The y coordinate to test.

public.name: copy
public.help: Copies the tile data and properties from the given tile to this tile.

parameters.name: tile
parameters.help: The tile to copy from.

public.name: intersects
public.help: Check for intersection with this tile.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The x axis in pixels.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The y axis in pixels.

parameters.name: right
parameters.help: The right point.

parameters.name: bottom
parameters.help: The bottom point.

returns.help: True if the Tile is interesting, otherwise false.

parameters.name: collides
parameters.help: If true will check any collides value.

parameters.name: faces
parameters.help: If true will check any face value.

public.name: setCollision
public.help: Sets the collision flags for each side of this tile and updates the interesting faces list.

parameters.name: left
parameters.help: Indicating collide with any object on the left.

parameters.name: right
parameters.help: Indicating collide with any object on the right.

parameters.name: up
parameters.help: Indicating collide with any object on the top.

parameters.name: down
parameters.help: Indicating collide with any object on the bottom.

public.name: setCollisionCallback
public.help: Set a callback to be called when this tile is hit by an object.\nThe callback must true true for collision processing to take place.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.help: Callback function.

parameters.name: context
parameters.help: Callback will be called within this context.

public.name: alpha
public.inlineHelp: The alpha value at which this tile is drawn to the canvas.

public.name: bottom
public.inlineHelp: The sum of the y and height properties.

public.name: canCollide
public.inlineHelp: True if this tile can collide on any of its faces or has a collision callback set.

public.name: collideDown
public.inlineHelp: Indicating collide with any object on the bottom.

public.name: collideLeft
public.inlineHelp: Indicating collide with any object on the left.

public.name: collideRight
public.inlineHelp: Indicating collide with any object on the right.

public.name: collideUp
public.inlineHelp: Indicating collide with any object on the top.

public.name: collides
public.inlineHelp: True if this tile can collide on any of its faces.

public.name: collisionCallback
public.inlineHelp: Tile collision callback.

public.name: collisionCallbackContext
public.inlineHelp: The context in which the collision callback will be called.

public.name: faceBottom
public.inlineHelp: Is the bottom of this tile an interesting edge?

public.name: faceLeft
public.inlineHelp: Is the left of this tile an interesting edge?

public.name: faceRight
public.inlineHelp: Is the right of this tile an interesting edge?

public.name: faceTop
public.inlineHelp: Is the top of this tile an interesting edge?

public.name: height
public.inlineHelp: The height of the tile in pixels.

public.name: index
public.inlineHelp: The index of this tile within the map data corresponding to the tileset, or -1 if this represents a blank/null tile.

public.name: layer
public.inlineHelp: The layer in the Tilemap data that this tile belongs to.

public.name: left
public.inlineHelp: The x value in pixels.

public.name: properties
public.inlineHelp: Tile specific properties.

public.name: right
public.inlineHelp: The sum of the x and width properties.

public.name: scanned
public.inlineHelp: Has this tile been walked / turned into a poly?

public.name: top
public.inlineHelp: The y value.

public.name: width
public.inlineHelp: The width of the tile in pixels.

public.name: x
public.inlineHelp: The x map coordinate of this tile.

public.name: y
public.inlineHelp: The y map coordinate of this tile.
